video December 2019 19 12 01 ​ Princess Cruises pri ​ Discovery Princess: Royal Class Ship 6 World Premiere Princess Cruises
We’re celebrating the debut of Discovery Princess, our 6th Royal Class ship, with a world premiere! Watch as our President Jan Swartz introduces the name and upcoming itineraries of this gorgeous new ship, setting sail November 2021.
